    • About Ursula & Associates


    Jason is the lead agent and owner of Ursula & Associates. He has been a national speaker and teacher for the real estate industry for years. “We are students of the market and excel in knowing how to help our clients navigate the market with ease. We work to get our clients top dollar with expert knowledge, in the least amount of time with the industry’s strongest marketing plan.”
